subject: Golf
Canadian Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker won the Canadian Open in Oakville, Ontario, for his second PGA Tour title of the year, closing with a two-under 70 for a three-stroke victory.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker won the Canadian Open in Oakville, Ontario, for his second PGA Tour title of the year, closing with a two-under 70 for a three-stroke victory.
